xmlText.h2: Eyecatchers: Monogram hand towels; combined fragrances; mega hair care
xmlText.p: (NOT INCLUDED IN YOUR TRIBUNE NEWS SERVICE SUBSCRIPTION. To subscribe to Trends and Shopping, see purchase information below.) (PHOTO)

Show your guests some love with paper XO beverage napkins or paper XO hand towels from Hudson Grace. Both are perfect for entertaining and leave guests feeling special. They come in white with red or gray monogram. The hand towels cost $25 for a package of 50 and can be used in the powder room or as dinner or lunch napkins. The cocktail napkins cost $18 for a set of 50. Get them now online at Hudsongracesf.com

Need help finding your signature fragrance? Jo Malone gives you an assist with the new Fragrance Combining Discovery Collection. Each fragrance combining trio features one 30 ml bottle and two 9 ml bottles of complementary scents. The fragrances can be mixed and match to create your own special scent. The sets include Wood Sage & Sea Salt Fragrance Combining Trio $95, Peony & Blush Suede Fragrance Combining Trio $105 an English Pear & Freesia Fragrance Combining Trio, $95. All three sets are available now at Jo Malone London boutiques and online at Jomalone.com

End dry hair with the new All Soft Mega range of hair care from Redken. The prescription-based hair care brand, has created the perfect solution for dry, coarse and unmanageable hair. The All Soft Mega collection is a mix of superfood ingredients including sacha inchi extract, aloe vera gel, cactus extract and Redken’s exclusive root-core-tip (RCT) Protein Complex. Hair is left soft, smooth and shiny. Products in the range include shampoo, conditioner, Mega Mega Mask, Hydramelt Leave-In Conditioner and the Recovery Tissue Mask Cap, a product inspired by the Korean Beauty trend which is designed to be used weekly for just 10 minutes in the shower. Priced from $8 to $29, the collection is available at Redken salons nationwide, Ulta and JCPenney.
